sect1.title: Installing kdebase

para.screen: Estimated build disk space: 132 MB Estimated installed space: 45 MB Package size: &kde-base-size; Estimated build time: 98 min (667 MHz)

sect1.para: kdebase can use many optional libraries and programs. The following are recommended: , lesstif, , , shadow, cups, and .
Other programs and libraries that can be used by kdebase are: lame, and pam
Check to see if /lib/libmisc.la exists. If not, run: ln -sf /usr/lib/libmisc.la /lib/libmisc.la
Install kdebase with: ./configure --prefix=&kde-dir; --enable-objprelink \ --disable-debug --disable-dependency-tracking --disable-lametest \ --with-shadow && make && make install
